sqlMap.select: SELECT rt.id as id, rst.snapshot_id as snapshotId, rtn.id as tagNameId, rst.server_id as serverId, rt.org_id as orgId, rtn.name as name, TO_CHAR(rst.created, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS') as created, TO_CHAR(rst.modified, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS') as modified FROM rhnSnapshotTag rst INNER JOIN rhnTag rt on rst.tag_id = rt.id INNER JOIN rhnTagName rtn on rt.name_id = rtn.id WHERE rst.tag_id > #id# OR rst.modified > #last_modified# ORDER by rst.snapshot_id ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE rhnIndexerWork SET last_id = #id#, last_modified = #last_modified# where object_type = 'snapshot_tag'
sqlMap.select: SELECT last_id from rhnIndexerWork where object_type='snapshot_tag'
SELECT last_modified from rhnIndexerWork where object_type='snapshot_tag'
